document_data.name: Thelia Ondertos
document_data.mainbody: '''Thelia Ondertos''' was a [[human]] woman who owned the [[Leaping Hart Tavern]] as of [[1479 DR]]. She lived in the city of [[Harglast]], in the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Coaxing the Flame|17-18}}
document_data.History: Thelia was an affable middle-aged woman who engaged in idle chit-chat for free, but required her patrons buy a round or two before she opened up to real gossip with strangers. She was good friends with [[Halagothra]] the Healer from [[Tarmalune]].
